front.title: •Emperor Palpatine
front.gametext: Never deploys or moves (even aboard a starship or vehicle) to a site opponent occupies. Where present, subtracts 3 from attempts to cross Vader over. Once per turn, you may take Force Lightning into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Immune to attrition.
front.lore: Sith Master and leader of Galactic Empire. Dark side mentor to Darth Vader. Controls the Empire by instilling fear in its subjects and greed in its governors.

combo: Emperor Palpatine + I Have You Now Add one battle destiny (two if Rebel is Luke) if a Dark Jedi and a Rebel with ability > 2 are involved in the same battle.
Emperor Palpatine + Force Field Cancels an attempt to target a Dark Jedi with a character weapon.
